benchmark_details.name: CRITIC BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: CRITIC BENCH is a comprehensive benchmark designed to assess LLMsâ€™ abilities to critique and rectify their reasoning across various tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically assess critique and correction reasoning in various LLMs.

data.source: 15 existing datasets covering mathematical, commonsense, symbolic, coding, and algorithmic tasks.
data.annotation: Responses were validated through rule-based methods, GPT-4 evaluations, and manual review.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the number of correct predictions divided by the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Model performance can be compared through accuracy rates in generation, critique, and correction.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through comparisons with existing methods and manual reviews.
